Welcome to Computer Builder’s documentation!¶

This is the introduction Computer Builder.

Requirements¶

Computer Builder depends on the following external packages:

Django version 1.6.2

Jinja2 version 2.7.2

MarkupSafe version 0.23

Pygments version 1.6

South version 0.8.4

Sphinx version 1.2.2

argparse version 1.2.1

django-ajax-selects version 1.3.4

django-registration version 1.0

docutils version 0.11

lxml version 3.3.3

psycopg2 version 2.5.2

requests version 2.2.1

wsgiref version 0.1.2
